root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-4-2, translated into en
root.data:
URL:

http://www.who.int/gho/en/

References:

WHO indicator definition (http://apps.who.int/gho/indicatorregistry/App_Main/view_indicator.aspx?iid=4664)
